items.sentence: Tom is probably not as smart as you think he is.
Tom is probably not as young as you think he is.
Tom is probably the oldest person in the office.
Tom is probably thinking about buying a new car.
Don\'t you ever wear any color other than black?
Why do guys care so much about what girls think?
I heard that Tom wanted to go to Boston with us.
I heard that both Tom and Mary have passed away.
I hope Tom feels the same way you do about this.
Tom asked me for something I couldn\'t give him.
